title: Modern Fade Reinvention
summary: Textured skin fade and tailored styling plan for a creative professional's rebrand shoot.
description: Our style team mapped growth patterns, introduced texturizing powder for volume, and documented at-home maintenance. The final look held through a full day of studio lighting.

thumbnail.alt: Barber performing a textured skin fade with precision clipper work.

gallery.alt: Close-up of fade blending at the back of the head.
Stylist applying finishing product before the photoshoot.
